Html:
I have been following most of the different approaches to the MVVM pattern and I have yet found one that really lends itself well to using a top level system such as a Ribbon control.

So then the question then comes into play what would be the best approach to using some of the more advance controls for a menu system such as the ‘Infragistics WPF Ribbon” control?

Nice to see that this is just another post that gets no answers.

This is one of the main problems that has not been solved with the MVVM pattern.

Anyone seen a good way to implement top level menu's using this pattern?

Without a good solution to making frameworks such as yours (which by the way I do like) work with Main level menus none of these frameworks will work for others like me that have comitments to our users.

Thanks, for listening.
